Olivier Assayas' film stars Asia Argento as a woman who had a relationship with Michael Madsen. Madsen is a business man who buys and sells antiques, including classical sculptures that no one loves anymore but him. He gets most of his works from other collectors who adore them in the same way he does and feel they're not worthy of keeping once they've passed through his hands.
